name: test_e2e_with_logs[117_SQLI_UNION_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_UNION_002` |
| **Name** | UNION ALL SELECT with multiple NULLs |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | union_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL`
- **Encoded**: `UNION%20ALL%20SELECT%20NULL%2CNULL`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~62000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:32:17.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_UNION_002-1770813137925-md5q7p pattern_id=SQLI_UNION_002 uri=/?q=UNION%20ALL%20SELECT%20NULL%2CNULL client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
